meanings.definition: To apply tape to something before an event or activity.
meanings.sent1: Before the race, the athletes were pretaping their ankles for support.
meanings.sent2: She always pretapes her equipment before the big game to avoid any last-minute issues.
meanings.sent3: The clown pretaped his nose to ensure it wouldn't fall off during the performance.
meanings.sent4: The students pretaped their presentation to make sure everything flowed smoothly.
meanings.sent5: Pretaping the cables before the concert saved a lot of time during setup.

meanings.definition: The act of preparing with tape before an event or activity.
meanings.sent1: The pretaping of the stage was crucial to prevent any accidents during the play.
meanings.sent2: He always carries a pretaping kit in his bag for emergencies.
meanings.sent3: The pretaping of the gift added a special touch to the birthday present.
meanings.sent4: The pretaping of the boxes made the moving process much smoother.
meanings.sent5: The pretaping of the posters ensured they stayed securely on the walls.
